sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { View, Text, TextInput, Picker, Button, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';
import { Formik } from 'formik';
import DatePicker from 'react-native-datepicker';

const MyForm = () => {
  const handleSubmit = (values) => {

    console.log('Données soumises :', values);
  };

  return (
    <View style={{backgroundColor:'white'}}>
    <Formik
      initialValues={{
        compte: '',
        bu: '',
        sujet: '',
        description: '',
        nature: '',
        type: '',
        niveauEng: '',
        dateRemise: '',
        dateClosing: '',
        rdvEtabli: '',
        CAestime : '',
        marge : '' ,
        margeestimee : '' , 
        planAction: '',
        risques: '',
        pointsFort: '',
      }}
      onSubmit={handleSubmit}
    >
      {({ handleChange, handleSubmit, values }) => (
        <View>
          <Text>Compte :</Text>
          <Picker selectedValue={values.compte} onValueChange={handleChange('compte')}>
    
          </Picker>

          <Text>BU :</Text>
         <Picker selectedValue={values.bu} onValueChange={handleChange('bu')}>
         <Picker.Item label="Logiciels d’Infrastructure" value="logiciels_infrastructure" />
         <Picker.Item label="Cybersécurité" value="cybersecurite" />
         <Picker.Item label="Service" value="service" />
         <Picker.Item label="Solutions Endpoint" value="solutions_endpoint" />
         <Picker.Item label="Cloud et Datacenter" value="cloud_datacenter" />
         </Picker>

          <Text>Sujet :</Text>
          <TextInput value={values.sujet} onChangeText={handleChange('sujet')} />
          <Text>Description :</Text>
          <TextInput value={values.description} onChangeText={handleChange('description')} />

          <Text>Nature :</Text>
           <Picker selectedValue={values.nature} onValueChange={handleChange('nature')}>
           <Picker.Item label="Acquisition" value="acquisition" />
           <Picker.Item label="Acquisition Service" value="acquisition_service" />
           <Picker.Item label="Infogérance" value="infogerance" />
           <Picker.Item label="Services" value="services" />
          </Picker>


          <Text>Type :</Text>
          <Picker selectedValue={values.type} onValueChange={handleChange('type')}>
            <Picker.Item label="Autre" value="autre" />
            <Picker.Item label="RFI" value="rfi" />
            <Picker.Item label="RFP" value="rfp" />
          </Picker>

          <Text>Niveau Eng :</Text>
          <Picker selectedValue={values.niveauEng} onValueChange={handleChange('niveauEng')}>
            <Picker.Item label="Engagement" value="engagement" />
            <Picker.Item label="Opportunité" value="opportunite" />
          </Picker>

          <Text>Date Remise :</Text>
          <DatePicker
            style={{ width: 200 }}
            date={values.dateRemise}
            mode="date"
            placeholder="Sélectionnez la date"
            format="YYYY-MM-DD"
            confirmBtnText="Confirmer"
            cancelBtnText="Annuler"
            onDateChange={(date) => handleChange('dateRemise')(date)}
          />
          <Text>Date closing :</Text>
          <DatePicker
            style={{ width: 200 }}
            date={values.dateClosing}
            mode="date"
            placeholder="Sélectionnez la date"
            format="YYYY-MM-DD"
            confirmBtnText="Confirmer"
            cancelBtnText="Annuler"
            onDateChange={(date) => handleChange('dateClosing')(date)}
          />
           <Text>CA estimé :</Text>
           <TextInput 
           keyboardType="numeric"
           value={value.CAestime}
           onChangeText={handleChange('CAestime')}
         />

          <Text>Plan d’Action :</Text>
          <TextInput value={values.planAction} onChangeText={handleChange('planAction')} />

          <Text>Risques :</Text>
          <TextInput value={values.risques} onChangeText={handleChange('risques')} />

          <Text>Points Forts :</Text>
          <TextInput value={values.pointsFort} onChangeText={handleChange('pointsFort')} />

          <Button title="Soumettre" onPress={handleSubmit} />
        </View>
      )}
    </Formik>
    </View>
  );
};

export default MyForm;


const styles = StyleSheet.create({})
